title: Booker T Washington National Monument: Learning Disability
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Learning Disability              Learning Disability       Programs and Tours   Ranger programs:   Tactile objects: All ranger programs strive to engage multiple senses and learning styles, and often include audio components and/or tactile objects.   Visitor Center:    Films and exhibits: 15-minute, narrated film, "Longing to Learn" shares sights and sounds of the park, Booker T. Washington himself and of historical moments. Many exhibits in the visitor center are tactile, including a touch and feel basket, historic artifacts, and displays.
